first time playing something this old, but i gotta say this game aged like fine wine

Playing this game gives me a massive headache and I don't know why. I had a lot of fun playing what little of it I did. I think it's the sound? I don't know, I'll try Black Mesa later and see if that works more for me.

mid 9 out of 10
Good
Gordon Freeman is badass as fuck.
Very good game. Took me forever to complete.

This game was made in 1998 and it has the jank to prove it.
Despite that fact, it IS Half Life-1 and holds alot of history in its genre and videogames as a whole.

A friend said it's kinda easy to get motion sick because of the slidey movement, so if that happens and you didn't exceed 2 hours don't feel too bad about missing out on this game.

there's a Remake called Black Mesa that is considerably more modern and made by fans.
Up until the end it's very faithful to this game and is in my honest completely anecdotal opinion a better experience across the board.

Otherwise, I'd recommend you play this first. It's an amazing experience seeing the leap in technology first hand and playing BM first would sorta muddle the waters.
good game but you might struggle to understand what to do

Half-Life, one of the best game series ever made.

This game still manages to hold up even after all this time, maybe not graphically but gameplay and mechanics wise. The gunplay is great, the A.I feels fun to play against, and the story is interesting enough to keep you playing and wanting to discover more about Xen, "G-Man", and the Black Mesa facility.

Das Spiel hat sich gut gehalten und bietet ein sehr intensives Spiel Erlebnis klar ein paar bugs hier und da aber gut das Spiel ist auch 23 Jahre alt und fÃ¼r 1998 ist es immer noch ein super game. Auf jeden Fall eine Empfehlung.
Best game

while the graphics have aged like skim milk, the presentation of the the game is top notch and impressive for 1998. once you get around the old graphics, the game is very immersive and still has effective environmental storytelling. while the shooting and the guns are mediocre, the gameplay is very well paced and very fun.
